com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.server.adapter

Class CheckType

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.server.adapter.CheckType

  • public class CheckType
extends Object
    The CheckType is a compound of different aspects of a Check.
    • The CheckType.CheckPriority decides if the Check is prioritized higher or lower.
    • The CheckType.CheckResultType defines which output should be created by the Acrolinx Server.
    • Also meta information could be defined.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CheckType.CheckPriority
      The CheckType.CheckPriority decides if the Check is prioritized higher or lower.
      static class  CheckType.CheckResultType
      The CheckType.CheckResultType defines the output from the Acrolinx Server or if a local client side extraction check should be performed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CheckType COMPARATIVE
      The comparative check which should be performed if the user closes a checked document and ClientProperties.isAutocheckOnFileClose() is true.
      Note: The check will be performed with CheckType.CheckPriority.BACKGROUND.
      static CheckType FLAG_EXTRACTION
      A local Check is performed.
      static CheckType INTERACTIVE
      The normal interactive check which should be performed if the user clicks the check button.
      static EnumSet<CheckType.CheckResultType> NO_RESULT
      The No Result should be returned to client.

    • Field Detail

      • NO_RESULT

        public static final EnumSet<CheckType.CheckResultType> NO_RESULT
        The No Result should be returned to client.

      • INTERACTIVE

        public static final CheckType INTERACTIVE
        The normal interactive check which should be performed if the user clicks the check button.

      • COMPARATIVE

        public static final CheckType COMPARATIVE
        The comparative check which should be performed if the user closes a checked document and ClientProperties.isAutocheckOnFileClose() is true.
        Note: The check will be performed with CheckType.CheckPriority.BACKGROUND. It will return a CheckType.CheckResultType.REPORT and add the meta info BackgroundCheck=true.

      • FLAG_EXTRACTION

        public static final CheckType FLAG_EXTRACTION
        A local Check is performed. The whole extracted and not excluded text will be flagged with ExtractionFlags. This check type may be performed via option dialog plug-in settings tab.

      • getMetaInfo

        public Map<String,String> getMetaInfo()
        Returns:
        the meta information shown in checking report. The result of this method will be merged with AdditionalData.getMetaInfo() returned by CheckInformation.getAdditionalMetaData(), but AdditionalData.getMetaInfo() will override meta information with same key.
